Whether body content is required._

Default is true, leading to an exception thrown in case_there is no body content. Switch this to false if you prefer_null to be passed when the body content is null.

Whether body content is required._

Default is {@code true}, leading to an exception thrown in case_there is no body content. Switch this to {@code false} if you prefer_{@code null} to be passed when the body content is {@code null}.
